definitions.definition: Any number of minutes after the last hour
examples: What's the time? - It's now quarter past twelve midday (or 12.15pm) -O,K., we'll stop at half ( past ) twelve
I'm past caring what he thinks of me.

definitions.definition: Having recovered or moved on from (a traumatic experience, etc.).
Passing by , especially without stopping or being delayed.
examples: Ignore them, we'll play past them.
Please don't drive past the fruit stand, I want to stop there.

secondary_definitions: ( time ) Any number of minutes after the last hour
Having recovered or moved on from (a traumatic experience, etc.).
Passing by , especially without stopping or being delayed.
